title: I wish Riot put the same effort into the other regions like Bilgewater
body:
With the release of Pyke, we got a lot of new stuff to celebrate this event.
We got the lore update (like the other regions got it), additionally audio lore, alot of missions for extra BE and loot like chests, ward skins....

They even introduced new loot with capsules and the Golden Krakens, brought back a game mode....

So much effort is put into Bilgewater and I love that we can celebrate the new release like that, but why always just put that effort into Bilgewater?
They already did that in the past when GP got reworked and now again.

I wish we could get the same stuff the next time we see a champion released or reworked for Zaun, Shadow Isles, Freljord, Shurima....
Please keep doing that, Riot. Serve the fans of other regions equally in the future.

replies.body:
This isn't so much a Story & Art request, as a Publishing/Promo request. You should try to hit up Rioters like DyQuill for questions relating to the *amount* of content created for specific champions (because honestly, this is all about Pyke, not Bilgewater!) ;-)

FWIW, I am 100% in agreement that we could do more for other regions, and I hope we will in future.

But nobody ever wants to give any contact information to anyone, as if RIOT staff hides from the mere forum members here. It's sad and stupid, but I can't change that. 

Reading that someone is supposed "to hit up RIOTER XY" is kinda funny since that is 100% impossible. . . (as I know myself from experience). So are you being sarcastic or mean to him?

Well, it's really on both parts because what Bilgewater gets isn't only capsules and such.

As we discussed previously, Bilgewater (and especially MF) got a lot of attention in terms of Lore too which no other character (or entire region) can even come close to.

Uhm what game mode did they bring back?
The butchers bridge is still regular Aram and the blackmarket brawlers didn't return.

And honestly I think the butchers bridge is the reason why they do this only with Bilgewater,they want to test some new stuff for Aram,so adding a few skins,loot and emotes for that will bring more people to try this out.

Also they likely had some leftovers from last years Bilgewater event(it was mentioned that Tahms bio was lying around half-finished for quite some time now).

And while we did get the audio-dramas,we didn't get a big singular story,like the one about Riven&Yasuo or the comic for Kai'sa,so thats merely the replacement for that.

It still is a bigger event than all the other regions got.
What did Piltover and Zaun get? An icon and some short stories.
Same for Demacia, Noxus, Ionia.

Bilgewater gets a map reskinned, an announcer with Pykes voice (at least I read so, don't play ARAM), new Bilgewater themed skins, a new ward skin, list of missions featuring Bilgewater champions and new hextech loot with capsules and Golden Krakens.

Don't you think it would be nice for fans of other regions to get an event celebrating It?
I would have killed to get something like that for Zaun.
Now my only hope is that we get something similar with the next Zaunite or Dr. Mundos rework.

You are super wrong, piratepeopletown are top ~~5 ~~  6 in terms of content:

Freljord got Howling abyss,
Skarnerpeople got dominion,
Shurima got ascension,
Edit: Shadow isles got the twisted treeline,
Void got that thresh minigame,
Piratepeople got a Howling Abyss skin, thats barely any content its not even a new gamemode, just a skin (an old one for the matter).  Even sme skin lines got more content than this (Star guardian, Blood moon, Project, Summer/Winter/Halloween)

My point is that they didn't have to make the butchers bridge from the ground up,it isn't something new.

And that map skin is likely the reason why Bilgewater got more than the other factions.
I mean think about it,the announcer is for aram,the missions focus on aram(and the ward skin can be earned through the missions) and the new items are for aram as well.

This event isn't done to solely advertise the new champ,it is also done to advertise the return of butchers bridge.

However I agree with your overall point.
Ideally every faction would have a mapskin(doesn't have to be for aram,could also be for others) and then each time a new champ or VGU for this faction gets released,they could do a small event alongside it.
Because once the assets are there,it'd be easy to just reuse them each time around.

They still do events of this caliber all the time, it's just not always connected to regions or lore. There was Star Guardian Invasion, with the whole questing and events there, there was the Dark Star Mode, Blood Moon Hunt, PROJECT event mode with capsules and missions, and then there was the Teemoing with DoomBots of Doom, and then there was the big Lunar Revel event this year. There's been tons of events on the caliber of this one, and yeah, while it's not all tied to lore, it's not like Riot is not doing high quality events.

Hence why I said same effort for the other regions.
Yes, we get alot of events like that and that's awesome.
I just would like to see other regions get such an event, too.

I would love to play missions featuring Zaunite champs, getting a new lineup of Chemtech skins and Zaun themed loot.
Because you darn landlubbers don't deserve it!

If they hadn't done what they did for the Bilgewater event back when they reworked GP, this wouldn't be nearly as good as it is now. Too bad they said they would stop doing those large scope lore events...
